A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A great piece of Star Wars. It sure was a bit silly in places and a little over long\, but personally I loved every second. Along with the packed out audience\, I laughed\, smiled and watched in awe\, as well as got a little choked up at a few bits. OK\, I would have made some different decisions if it were MY version of Star Wars\, but it’s not and felt refreshing to see the way things played out. Would I have liked Luke to not keel over and die after some heavy meditation at the end? Of course! But really looking forward to seeing how part three plays out.
